I will do that if it’s the only choice of course. But I think he and I would be better served spending time together and letting him direct conversations
as he has started to do. It gives him a voice I encourage. I can hear the relief in his voice when I thank him.
So given today, after a month with zero progress, I think if we aren’t careful, we are doomed to an eternal “just over the next hill” purgatory. I trust
you. Please trust Adrian. Please trust me. Please give him the choice to decide to spend time with me or not.
Plus... he really, really, wants his Nike Tech
Message 1325 of 4024
We are both pretty stoked for it!
